thread.title: Oakland may pay beating victim $205,000 settlement
thread.title_full: Oakland may pay beating victim $205,000 settlement - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rachel Swan
title: Oakland may pay beating victim $205,000 settlement
text:
Photo: Mathew Sumner, Special To The Chronicle Joshua Daniels, after the assault, in August 2013. Joshua Daniels, after the assault, in August 2013.
The Oakland city attorney’s office is recommending that the city pay $205,000 to settle a lawsuit from a resident who claimed that he was beaten by city workers outside City Hall. Joshua Daniels, after the assault, in August 2013. Joshua Daniels, after the assault, in August 2013.
The Oakland city attorney’s office is recommending that the city pay $205,000 to settle a lawsuit from a resident who claimed that he was beaten by city workers outside City Hall.
